name: CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_Condition_EvaluationforRecordTypeFields
description: execution logic for a record type
sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldPath: rule!CMGT_UTIL_CastJsonToMap(
    jsonText: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.fieldPathJson]
  ),
  local!initialValue: index(
    rule!CMGT_UTIL_CastJsonToMap(
      jsonText: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.valueJson]
    ),
    "value",
    null
  ),
  /*Handling extra id field for the user type record and if role was selected for type instead of user  */
  local!value: touniformstring(
    a!match(
      value: local!fieldPath.extraConfigurations.code,
      equals: "ROLE",
      then: rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(
        data: ri!data,
        field: a!map(
          uuid: "7576a553-bb91-4848-962a-c7a23a9f3b2d",
          field: recordType!CMGT_Role.username,
          relationship: recordType!CMGT_Case.roles,
          extraConfigurations: a!map(
            evaluation: a!map(
              filters: a!map(
                field: recordType!CMGT_Role.roleTypeId,
                operator: "=",
                value: local!initialValue
              )
            )
          )
        )
      ),
      default: index(
        local!initialValue,
        "id",
        local!initialValue
      )
    )
  ),
  /*casting it to to integer because only the pk is stored in the value*/
  local!caseValue: touniformstring(
    rule!CMGT_AUTO_EVAL_returnRuntimeValue(data: ri!data, field: ri!field)
  ),
    a!match(
      value: ri!condition[recordType!CMGT_Condition.operator],
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_INCLUDES,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(
        intersection(local!caseValue, local!value)
      ),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_DOES_NOT_INCLUDE,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(
        intersection(local!caseValue, local!value)
      ),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_EQUAL_TO,
      then: local!caseValue = local!value,
      /*if null not equal to operator should return true*/
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_NOT_EQUAL_TO,
      then: local!caseValue <> local!value,
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NULL,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsBlank(value: local!caseValue),
      equals: cons!CMGT_TXT_AUTOMATION_OPERATOR_IS_NOT_NULL,
      then: rule!CMGT_UTIL_IsNotBlank(input: local!caseValue),
      default: false()
    )
  
)
